ai.persona: The Wandering Star is a heavily modified Constellation-class freighter, rebuilt so many times that little of the original ship remains. She's ugly, patched, and looks like she should have been scrapped decades agoâ€”which is exactly how Captain Reva likes it. Beneath the battered exterior is a vessel that can outrun most military craft, carries hidden weapon mounts, and has enough secret compartments to make a customs inspector weep. She's become something of a legend among Free Traders: the ship that can't be caught, can't be killed, and always comes home.

description.visual: Asymmetric hull, mismatched armor plates, scorch marks that never quite buff out
description.interior: Cramped, functional, covered in personal touches from the crew

history: Captured by pirates, modified for raiding
Won by Reva in a card game (or so she claims)
Declared destroyed by Hegemony three times
secrets: Has a hidden compartment even the crew doesn't know about
The nav computer contains pre-Collapse star charts
One of the modifications is Hegemony military-grade (stolen)
There's a dead man's switch tied to the reactor

voice.speech_patterns: The crew talks about the Star like she's alive. 'She doesn't like the cold.' 'She's telling us something's wrong.' The ship's quirks are legendary.
